name: age
text: the participant's age in years

name: sex
text: the participant's gender dummy coded (female=0 male=1)

name: education
text: the participant's education in years(0=High school (Year 9 or lower), 1=High school (Year 10), 2=High school (Year 12), 3=Certificate 1 & 2, 4=Certificate 3 & 4, 5=Diploma / Advanced Diploma, 6=Bachelors Degree, 7=Graduate Certificate / Diploma, 8=Masters Degree, 9=Doctoral Degree)

name: vr_experience
text: the participant's experience with virtual reality (0=Never, 1=Less than 1 hour, 2=1 – 10 hours, 3=10 – 50 hours, 4=More than 50 hours)

name: typical_sleep
text: the participant's typical sleep duration in hours

name: depression
text: the participant's depression score

name: anxiety
text: the participant's anxiety score

name: stress
text: the participant's stress score

name: NART_score
text: the participant's NART score, higher = better

name: NART_time
text: the participant's NART time in seconds

name: RPM_score
text: the participant's Raven's Progressive Matrices score, higher = better

name: RPM_time
text: the participant's Raven's Progressive Matrices time in seconds

name: BVMT_trial_1_score
text: the participant's score for trial 1 of the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_trial_2_score
text: the participant's score for trial 2 of the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_trial_3_score
text: the participant's score for trial 3 of the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_total_recall
text: the participant's total recall score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_delayed_recall
text: the participant's score for the delayed recall trial of the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_total_recall
text: the participant's total recall score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_learning
text: the participant's learning score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_percent_recalled
text: the participant's percent recalled score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_recognition_hits
text: the participant's recognition hits score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_recognition_false_alarms
text: the participant's recognition false alarms score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, lower = better

name: BVMT_recognition_discrimination_index
text: the participant's recognition discrimination index score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: BVMT_recognition_response_bias
text: the participant's response bias score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_1_score
text: the participant's trial 1 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_1_time
text: the participant's trial 1 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

name: RAVLT_trial_2_score
text: the participant's trial 2 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_2_time
text: the participant's trial 2 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

name: RAVLT_trial_3_score
text: the participant's trial 3 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_3_time
text: the participant's trial 3 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

name: RAVLT_trial_4_score
text: the participant's trial 4 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_4_time
text: the participant's trial 4 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

name: RAVLT_trial_5_score
text: the participant's trial 5 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_5_time
text: the participant's trial 5 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

name: RAVLT_trial_distraction_score
text: the participant's distraction trial score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_distraction_time
text: the participant's distraction trial time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

name: RAVLT_trial_free_recall_score
text: the participant's free recall trial score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_free_recall_time
text: the participant's free recall trial time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

name: RAVLT_delayed_recall_duration
text: the length of time before the participant's delayed recall trial in the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_delayed_recall_score
text: the participant's delayed recall trial score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_delayed_recall_time
text: the participant's delayed recall trial time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

name: RAVLT_recognition_hits
text: the participant's recognition hits for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_recognition_misses
text: the participant's recognition false alarms for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_trial_12345_total
text: the participant's total score for the first 5 trials of the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

name: RAVLT_sum_of_trials
text: the participant's total score for all trials of the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better
